    public class BlogSelectionBoxController
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.multiaction.MultiActionController
    Ajax functions for the blog selection box widgets and the blog auto suggest widget.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • findBlogs

        public void findBlogs(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
               throws IOException
        Searches for blogs and returns a JSON array containing JSON objects describing the found blogs. The first element of the array is a summary JSON object holding the resultsTotal and resultsReturned attributes.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        response - the response
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an error
